remarks: Value of preliminary map from vectors to functionals in the closed kernel dual space, for nonzero ` Y ` .  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2015.)
statement:

hdmap1val2.i $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1val2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap1val2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.

hdmap1val2 $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` <. X , F , Y >. ) = ( iota_ h e. D ( ( M ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) = ( L ` { h } ) /\ ( M ` ( N ` { ( X .- Y ) } ) ) = ( L ` { ( F R h ) } ) ) ) ) $.
